data.name: The Cat and the Box
data.detailed_description:
The Cat and the Box is a story-rich game in which a brave player might struggle to save their soul. Taking place beyond our causality, the game lasts until the man up above pulls the plug.
  • Explore 12 levels and complete 5 2D arcade games
  • Meet fallen creatures in the only City
  • Fight with a demon for your soul
  • Do as He failed to do.

Controls

  • WASD to move
  • Esc or Alt+Tab to pause and view options
  • Space to jump
  • E to interact

data.about_the_game:
The Cat and the Box is a story-rich game in which a brave player might struggle to save their soul. Taking place beyond our causality, the game lasts until the man up above pulls the plug.
  • Explore 12 levels and complete 5 2D arcade games
  • Meet fallen creatures in the only City
  • Fight with a demon for your soul
  • Do as He failed to do.

Controls

  • WASD to move
  • Esc or Alt+Tab to pause and view options
  • Space to jump
  • E to interact

data.short_description: Built on no engine or external libraries, this game takes you through a 3D adventure rendered in a plain text window.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Vista, 7, or 10
  • Processor: Intel 2.77GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 3000 or above.
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: no requirement
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OS X 10.7.3, or later.
  • Processor: Intel 2.77GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 3000 or above.
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: no requirement
  • Additional Notes: Must run Java
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu LTS 16.04/Steam Machine.
  • Processor: Intel 2.77GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 3000 or above.
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: no requirement
  • Additional Notes: Must run Java
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
